sources.data_found: Vista: Features 600 NVIDIA H100 Tensor Core GPUs / Grace Hopper Superchips.
Vista User Guide: 600 Grace Hopper (GH) nodes; each GH node has one NVIDIA H200 GPU.
Lonestar6: 32 GPU nodes (Gemini found) to 84 GPU nodes (OpenAI found) with A100s.
Lonestar6 hosts 84 A100 GPU nodes (3x A100 PCIe 40GB) and 4 H100 GPU nodes (2x H100 PCIe 80GB).
Longhorn hosts 96 V100 nodes and 8 large memory V100 nodes (Total 416 V100s). Note: Decommissioned.
Maverick2: V100 and P100 nodes. Note: Decommissioned.
Verification of large Online Master's of Computer Science (MSCS) program.
Student enrollment: 5320 undergrad, 1520 grad, 760 PhD (estimated breakdown).

student_data.notes: Undergraduate and PhD counts sourced from OpenAI estimates based on Fall 2024 'About' page data. Graduate count (2,752) sourced from Gemini (2023-2024 Statistical Handbook) as it explicitly captures the large volume of Online Master's (MSCS/MSAI) students which general estimates may undercount. The highest values from each category were retained.

gpu_resources.notes:
1) VISTA CLUSTER OVERLAP: The 600 units listed under 'h200_count' and 'gh200_count' refer to the SAME physical hardware (TACC Vista). These are NVIDIA Grace Hopper Superchips, which contain H200-class GPU architecture. Both fields are populated to satisfy the 'highest value' rule for available keys, but the total is 600 nodes, not 1200. 
2) LONESTAR6: Contains 84 nodes x 3 A100s (252 total) and 4 nodes x 2 H100 PCIe (8 total). 
3) DECOMMISSIONED SYSTEMS: The V100 (Longhorn/Maverick2) and P100 counts are included based on raw model findings, but notes indicate these systems (Longhorn and Maverick2) were decommissioned/retired around late 2022.

analysis_notes: Ensemble result aggregated from OpenAI and Gemini models. TACC resources (Vista, Lonestar6, Frontera) provide massive scale, though older systems (Longhorn, Maverick2) appear in search results despite decommissioning status. Student counts show significant variance due to the inclusion/exclusion of large online Master's programs; highest credible numbers were merged.
